channel.title: Thousand Island Dressing on Chef Frank's Recipes

item.title: Tartar Sauce For Fish
item.description: Quick Tartar Sauce Recipe makes fish meals complete. With a touch of lemon, Tartar Sauce is great with Fried Clams or Walleye, and Fish and Chips. Tartar Sauce Ingredients 1 c mayonaise or salad dressing 1/2 c sweet pickle relish 1 -2 tbsp lemon juice 1/2 tsp. Chef Frankâ€™s Seasoning Tartar Sauce Directions Mix ingredients together well, serve with fish and other seafoods. Refrigerate, covered. Note: Did you know that by adding 1/4 c ketchup to this recipe you have a great Thousand Island sauce.
